title: How to locate executable section
content:
How to locate executable section in PE file?
Is there any of typical way to locate executable section in any PE file?

comments.text: What are you actually trying to do?
@IgorSkochinsky i'am trying to know how to locate the programm executable section from pe
yes, but what do you plan to do next?

There could be more than one section with executable code, you will need to look at the characteristics for flag 0x20 (
IMAGE_SCN_CNT_CODE
)
